mapper.select: SELECT m_post.*, m_account.username, m_account.account_img FROM m_post LEFT JOIN m_account ON (m_account.id = m_post.manager_id) LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
SELECT m_post.*, m_account.username, m_account.account_img FROM m_post LEFT JOIN m_account ON (m_account.id = m_post.manager_id) WHERE m_post.id = #{id};
SELECT m_post.*, m_account.username, m_account.account_img FROM m_post LEFT JOIN m_account ON (m_account.id = m_post.manager_id) ORDER BY m_post.created_at LIMIT 20;
SELECT m_post.*, m_account.username, m_account.account_img FROM m_post LEFT JOIN m_account ON (m_account.id = m_post.manager_id) ORDER BY reply_num LIMIT 20;
